name: Driver: You Are The Wheelman!
description: The classic high-speed chase game that started the series, featuring realistic car physics and a cinematic 70s atmosphere.

name: Driver 2 (ReDriver2)
description: The enhanced PC port project of the PlayStation classic, bringing the open-world driving sequel to modern systems with improved performance.

name: Driv3r
description: Tanner returns in this undercover operation across Miami, Nice, and Istanbul, featuring both driving and on-foot combat.

name: Driver: San Francisco
description: A unique entry featuring the 'Shift' mechanic, allowing players to instantly teleport between hundreds of licensed vehicles in a massive San Francisco.

name: CarX Drift Racing Online
description: A deep drifting simulator focusing on realistic physics, car tuning, and competitive online drift battles.

name: CarX Street
description: An open-world street racing game where you can build your dream car and compete in high-stakes races across a massive city.

name: The Crew
description: A massive open-world racing game that allows you to drive across a scaled-down version of the entire United States.

name: The Crew 2
description: Experience the thrill of American motorsports in a massive open world, switching instantly between cars, bikes, boats, and planes.

name: Wreckfest Mobile
description: The acclaimed demolition derby racer optimized for mobile platforms, featuring epic crashes and intense contact racing.

name: Split/Second
description: An action-heavy arcade racer set within a fictional reality TV show where you can trigger massive environmental traps to wreck your opponents.

name: Descenders
description: A fast-paced extreme downhill mountain biking game with procedurally generated worlds where mistakes have real consequences.

name: Sports Car Challenge
description: A high-end mobile racing experience featuring licensed luxury sports cars and precise handling.

name: Sports Car Challenge 2
description: The sequel to the premium mobile racer, adding new tracks and a wider selection of high-performance supercars.

name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit (Mobile)
description: The mobile adaptation of the high-speed pursuit classic, optimized for 64-bit iOS devices.

name: Test Drive Unlimited
description: A landmark open-world 'MOOR' (Massively Open Online Racing) game set on the island of Oahu, featuring luxury lifestyle elements.

name: Test Drive Unlimited 2
description: Expanding the formula with two islands (Ibiza and Oahu), dynamic weather, and a deeper focus on social and progression elements.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown
description: The latest chapter in the TDU franchise, inviting players to Hong Kong Island for a high-stakes competition between the Sharps and the Streets.
